data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My brother has a very messy room. There ____ many ____ clothes ____ the ____, ____ the ____ can ____ full ____ trash. He ____ opens ____ windows, so ____ smells ____. He brings in food to eat, and there are dishes all over his desk.
data.partBlankContent: My brother has a very messy room. There a__ many di___ clothes o_ the fl___, a__ the gar____ can i_ full o_ trash. He ne___ opens t__ windows, so i_ smells t__. He brings in food to eat, and there are dishes all over his desk.
data.fullContent: My brother has a very messy room. There are many dirty clothes on the floor, and the garbage can is full of trash. He never opens the windows, so it smells too. He brings in food to eat, and there are dishes all over his desk.
data.answer: 我哥哥的房间很乱。地板上有很多脏衣服，垃圾桶里都是垃圾。他从来不打开窗户，所以也有气味。他把食物拿进来吃，桌子上到处都是盘子。
